name: Music Shooter
description:
Create music by shooting falling objects, complete patterns to gain access to more sounds. 

This prototype level is in the style of medieval music using samples from a harp, recorder and lute.

Feedback welcome.

Controls: WASD or arrow keys to move. Click or spacebar to shoot. F toggles fullscreen. Esc to quit.

Goal: Avoid getting hit. Shoot the falling objects to make sounds. Complete the pattern in the top left corner and you'll trigger a red cylinder, destroy this to get the next pattern with more sounds. Hit the yellow boxes to change the background noise.
